joy: Keep shining, your happiness is contagious!
Breathe in joy. Breathe out peace.
sadness: It’s okay to feel down. This too shall pass.
You are stronger than your sadness.
Feel it, then gently let it go.
anger: Take a deep breath. You control the fire inside.
Let go of anger — it doesn’t serve your calm.
Peace is always stronger than rage.
fear: Fear is temporary. Your strength is forever.
Even the darkest night ends with sunrise.
You’ve made it through everything before — you will again.
love: Let your heart stay open and soft.
Be love. Give love. Receive love.
surprise: Stay curious — the best is yet to come.
